remarks: The product of a family of topological monoids is a topological monoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
prdstmdd.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdstmdd.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdstmdd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdstmdd.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> TopMnd ) $.
prdstmdd $p |- ( ph -> Y e. TopMnd ) $.
